Nuxt module for GitHub v4 API
Source plugin for pulling data into Nuxt from the official GitHub v4
. Data is fetched at build time, and can be used to create static assets.
Add this token to your environment variables (
yarn add nuxt-github-api # or npm install nuxt-github-api
// token: required by the GitHub API
// graphQLQuery: defaults to a search query
// variables: Object which includes any GraphQL variables required by your query.
You can also pass the options as a separate key:
// token: required by the GitHub API
// graphQLQuery: defaults to a search query
// variables: Object which includes any GraphQL variables required by your query.
In your Vue components, you can now access this data on
